name: RE:Solver
storyline: Step into the world of RESolver, a gripping murder mystery investigation game where you take on the role of an anonymous freelancer operating outside the legal system. Utilize your hacking, social engineering, and private investigation skills to unravel intricate cold cases from around the world. Dive into a web of deception, gather evidence, and uncover the truth as you work solo or collaborate with up to 5 players in a thrilling immersive experience.
summary: Step into the role as an investigator under the RE:Solver Agency, a new investigation unit designed to take a fresh look at complicated cases. With your skills and newly granted overreaching privileges, you can access numerous confidential records on essentially anyone.
